backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining file, folder, note, mission, and task types with storage, authorization, state tracking, and health/diagnostic query methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping two mission‑creation UI features to affected frontend files and components with confidence and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of short summaries describing the purpose and behavior of numerous frontend components, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/DRAFT_BASELINE_V114.md: Documentation establishing the v114 baseline, verifying exact frontend parity, and outlining validation, flows, and change control rules.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind setup defining light and dark theme CSS variables for colors, borders, and UI elements.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document configuring PWA metadata, icons, and loading the main React entrypoint.
frontend/PAUSE_AFTER_RESTORE.md: Post‑restoration freeze notice prohibiting code changes until user approval and detailing allowed documentation actions.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining app name, colors, icons, and display settings for MyGallery.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing minimal precaching and a network-first caching strategy with runtime cache updates.
frontend/RESTORE_LIVE_V114_CHECKLIST.md: Checklist verifying full restoration of frontend behavior and file integrity to Live version 114 across auth, UI, components, and flows.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Wraps app providers and handles intro-screen logic based on Internet Identity authentication state.
frontend/src/components/ActorInitErrorSt: UI component showing categorized actor initialization errors with retry, logout, and expandable technical details.
frontend/src/components/AnimatedGalleryI: SVG-based animated target-style gallery icon with hover effects.
frontend/src/components/ConnectivityIndi: Empty component file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/DecorativeBottom: Renders a fixed decorative bottom border line.
frontend/src/components/ExternalOpenFall: Dialog shown when a file fails to open externally, providing retry and download actions.
frontend/src/components/FilePreviewDialo: Dialog for previewing files with support for images, videos, PDFs, Office docs, and file actions like download, delete, move, and open externally.
frontend/src/components/FileUploadSectio: Handles uploading files, creating links, and creating notes with progress tracking and validation.
frontend/src/components/FoldersButton.ts: Floating button that opens the folders interface, with optional disabled and overlay states.
frontend/src/components/FoldersDialog.ts: Deprecated folder management dialog allowing creation, renaming, deletion, and selection of folders.
frontend/src/components/FoldersFullScree: Full‑screen folder manager supporting creation, renaming, deletion, and folder selection.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer displaying copyright and external link attribution.
frontend/src/components/FullScreenViewer: Full‑screen file viewer with swipe navigation and actions like download, delete, share, and moving files to folders or missions.
frontend/src/components/GallerySection.t: Displays files and notes in a gallery with selection, touch long‑press, viewer dialogs, and file/note actions.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Renders the app header with theme toggle, auth menu, progress bar, and gallery icon.
frontend/src/components/IntroScreen.tsx: Shows a brief animated splash screen and fades out before calling onComplete.
frontend/src/components/LinkOpenFallback: Dialog shown when a link cannot open, offering retry or copy-to-clipboard options.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Login button handling Internet Identity authentication with loading state.
frontend/src/components/MissionDetailFul: Full-screen mission view supporting title editing, task management, autosave, and attached file/note viewing.
frontend/src/components/MissionEditorDia: Dialog for creating missions with a title field and task list builder.
frontend/src/components/MissionsButton.t: Floating button that opens the missions section with animated icon.
frontend/src/components/MissionsFullScre: Full-screen mission list with selection, creation, deletion, swipe actions, and progress calculation.
frontend/src/components/MobileOnlyLayout: Wrapper layout that renders children inside a mobile-only container.
frontend/src/components/MoveToMissionDia: Dialog for moving selected files or notes into a chosen mission.
frontend/src/components/NoteViewerDialog: Dialog for viewing a note with actions for sharing, downloading, moving, and deleting.
frontend/src/components/SendToFolderDial: Dialog for moving or removing files or notes to/from folders with performance tracking.
Swipeable row component enabling edit and delete actions with gesture handling.
frontend/src/components/UnifiedProgressB: Global upload progress bar showing total progress and item count.
frontend/src/components/WelcomeIntroScre: Shows an intro screen with a target-themed SVG graphic and descriptive text, ending with a login button.
frontend/src/contexts/ActorContext.tsx: Manages backend actor initialization with retry logic, error handling, and admin-token setup via React context.
frontend/src/contexts/UploadContext.tsx: Tracks upload batches, progress updates, and completion using a context with batched animation-frame updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the current identity and refreshes dependent queries on changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth state, login, logout, and identity loading via a React context.
frontend/src/hooks/useIsCoarsePointer.ts: Detects whether the device uses a coarse (touch) pointer and updates on media-query changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useMissionAutosave.ts: Autosaves mission title and tasks with debouncing, change detection, and queued updates across mission switches.
frontend/src/hooks/useMissionsQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for listing, fetching, creating, and updating missions using a backend actor with cache updates and error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotesQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for creating, retrieving, deleting, and moving notes, with cache invalidation for related note lists.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Implements React Query hooks for files and folders, including listing, folder-specific queries, mission-specific queries, and folder creation with performance helpers.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining light and dark theme variables, component styles, and mobile layout constraints.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a utility function for merging conditional class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and renders the root component.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Main homepage component managing UI state, loading core data via hooks, and optionally running development smoke tests.
frontend/src/utils/actorInitializationMe: Defines standardized actor initialization messages and utilities to classify backend errors such as not-ready, initialization failure, invalid admin token, and stopped canister.
frontend/src/utils/externalOpen.ts: Provides helpers for opening external URLs, downloading files, exporting notes, and sharing files using Web Share API.
frontend/src/utils/fileOpenRules.ts: Determines how files should open based on MIME type, deciding between in-app viewer, office preview, or direct download.
frontend/src/utils/filePreview.ts: Categorizes MIME types into previewable file types and returns human-readable labels for each category.
frontend/src/utils/missionTaskCompare.ts: Compares two arrays of mission tasks with BigInt-safe equality checks.
frontend/src/utils/notesTime.ts: Empty placeholder file with no implemented logic.
frontend/src/utils/performanceDiagnostic: Implements an opt-in performance diagnostics tool for timing operations and logging durations.
frontend/src/utils/reactQueryDiagnostics: Adds diagnostics for React Query caches and logs mutation lifecycles to debug mission deletion issues.
frontend/src/utils/smokeTestCoreFlows.ts: Runs a smoke test of core app flows including creating folders, missions, uploading files, and verifying list APIs.
frontend/src/utils/uploadConcurrency.ts: Implements a simple concurrency limiter for controlling parallel promise execution.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash routing), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them from storage or the hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, radii, animations, and enabling plugins for animation and typography.
frontend/V114_BASELINE_FRONTEND_FILES.tx: Canonical list of all frontend files that define the v114 baseline for drift detection and repeatable sync validation.
project_state.json: Defines the current project state focused on improving the mobile usability of the New Mission form without altering other app areas.
